SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.bg_login_id as bgLoginId, a.login_name as loginName, a.password as passWord, a.nickname as nickName, a.phone, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.qq, a.role_id as roleId, b.agent_name as agentName, c.balance, (select count(*) from t_user_cards uc where a.user_id=uc.user_id) as cardNumber, d.nickname as ywName, e.role_name as roleName FROM t_users a left join m_agents b on b.agent_id=a.agent_id left join t_user_account c on c.user_id=a.user_id left join t_users d on d.user_id=a.be_user_id and d.role_id=3 LEFT JOIN m_roles e on a.role_id=e.role_id where a.is_delete = 0
and a.bg_login_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{bgLoginId},'%') )
and a.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{userId},'%') )
and a.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{loginName},'%') )
and a.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{nickName},'%') )
and a.user_type = #{userType}
and a.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{phone},'%') )
and a.qq LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{qq},'%') )
and a.be_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{beUserId},'%') )
and a.role_id = #{roleId}
and d.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{ywName},'%') )
and TO_DAYS(a.update_date) >= TO_DAYS( #{loginStartTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.update_date) <= TO_DAYS( #{loginEndTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.create_date) >= TO_DAYS( #{registerStartTime})
and TO_DAYS(a.create_date) <= TO_DAYS( #{registerEndTime})

SELECT a.head_url as headUrl, a.nickname as nickName, a.user_id as userId, a.bg_login_id as bgLoginId, a.phone, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.be_user_id as beUserId, b.account_id as accountId, b.balance, b.total_recharge as totalRecharge, b.total_expend as totalExpend, b.total_income as totalIncone, b.total_withdraw as totalWithdraw, b.total_lottery as totalLottery, cast((b.total_income-b.total_expend ) as decimal(10,2)) as actionTotle, c.card_id as cardId, c.card_bank as cardBank, c.card_no as cardNo, c.card_name as cardName, c.bank_type as bankType, d.agent_id as agentId, d.agent_name as agentName, e.nickname as ywName FROM t_users a LEFT JOIN t_user_account b ON a.user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_cards c ON a.user_id=c.user_id LEFT JOIN m_agents d ON a.agent_id=d.agent_id left join t_users e on e.user_id=a.be_user_id and e.role_id=3 WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} limit 1
